TopicTitle: What does "Have an Engineer on the engineer" mean? (station contract)
CreatedByName: i am stranded on the mun

Articles.CreatedByName: i am stranded on the mun
Articles.Content: Iwas playing on PS4 and When i went to look at a station contract one of the requirements was "have an engineer on the engineer " WHAT DOES THIS MEAN!
Can you take a screenshot/image? It's possible that "engineer" could have meant "engine," but is either displaying wrong or is a typo.
I suspect that’s a mistake in the contract text, it should probably be “have an engineer on the station”.
Or maybe you have a craft (probably a station) named "the Engineer"?
